void DzSimpleColorWgt::setInderminate ( bool  onOff  ) 

This is a two-state control. It can be set to an indeterminate state indicating "no color" as the value. This method is used to set that indeterminate state.

Parameters:
onOff If true, the control will be set to an indeterminate value.
